name: King Charles Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we arrive very late in Ocean city and we go all around to find a place to spend a night. the offer in that city is very low. you can find a lot of hotels but very expencive and overrated. we were very lucky to find a room at the king charles. room was big (see photos) and clean. the owner was very nice ask her everything you need (restaurants, infos...) she was very helpful. wifi and parking available.
reviews.title: best small hotel in the nearby

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After a horrible experience at another hotel.. we lucked out on getting a room at King Charles the following day. The lady at the front desk, who I assumed owned the hotel, apologized for us having a bad experience at the other hotel and made us feel very comfortable. The rooms were a decent size, but very clean and cozy. Our room also had a balcony which was great to relax after the beach. We will definitely be back everything was amazing.
reviews.title: Wonderful!!!

reviews.text: Feels something like a B&B without the breakfast: not large number of rooms, 2-person friendly and attentive staff, lobby and front porch for relaxing, clean and well-kept, insistence on good behavior from guests, etc. Great location one block from the boardwalk. Free parking space no more than 1/2 block away. Free wireless Internet access. Full range of cable TV channels. The room size is definitely as advertised -- "modest" -- so one isn't going to want to hang out in the room a great deal (especially with active kids), but that's what the beach is for. There is a table that functions as the TV stand with a refrigerator and microwave next to it. You can hear comings & goings of others, but the loud fan from the window a/c works well to cover most of that.
reviews.title: A good option for an Ocean City visit

description: The King Charles Hotel invites you to relax and enjoy your summer vacation in our clean, comfortable and friendly hotel. Our convenient downtown location is one half-block from the beach in the middle of Ocean City's famous Boardwalk. Charming and affordable, the King Charles Hotel is within walking distance of Ocean City's amusements, many fine restaurants, and other attractions. Each of our modest 22 rooms are smoke free and equipped with cable TV, wireless internet access, a dorm-size refrigerator, microwave, air-conditioning, phone, and private bath. Complimentary coffee and tea is available in the hotel lobby. Off street parking for one vehicle.
